name: Score Keeper (Kout)
description:
The Ultimate Score Keeper for the popular Kuwaiti game Kout is finally here!

The Score Keeper App is a free and easy-to-use application that allows the user to keep tabs on the score during a Kout game.

The App also provides tools, in both English and Kuwaiti, that portray the on-going struggle between the two teams, showing the wins and losses for the competing teams.

The score history screen eliminates any disputes that arise during a heated game.

It is the final say at the end of the game.

FEATURES:
- An easy to use and understand user-interface.

- Available in English and Kuwaiti (Arabic).

- Keeps track of the team scores with the ability to undo the last additions.

- A "Score History" screen which shows the history of the calls and scores for the current game, shown in colors to indicate which calls were wins or losses.

- Adjustable options including the score limit and more.

- (Landscape view) Turn the phone while in the call screen to show a different representation of the current score and the struggle between the teams! (Turn the phone).
